name: Sendal
0:
”Alexa, turn on name”
”Alexa, turn off name”
”Alexa, brighten name”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Sendal manages your connected smart home devices for your personalized autonomous home experience. Sendal provides a learning home that adapts over time to your personal preferences. Sendal controls many brands of connected thermostats, lightings, and doorlocks.

To link your Sendal account use the Amazon Alexa mobile application. Simply tap on Devices and enable the Sendal smart home skill. Enter your Sendal account credentials to link Alexa and Sendal.
